title: signin with email and password
description: Verify that the /auth/signin endpoint successfully authenticates a user with valid email and password credentials and returns the user object and authentication token.

title: create new user account
description: Verify that the /auth/signup endpoint creates a new user account when provided with valid name, email, and password, and returns appropriate success response.

title: get lessons for user
description: Verify that the /lessons endpoint returns a list of lessons filtered by optional level and language query parameters, and that the lessons conform to the CEFR levels and language specified.

title: start a lesson
description: Verify that the /lessons/{lessonId}/start endpoint successfully starts a lesson when provided with a valid lessonId path parameter and returns a success response.

title: get user gamification state
description: Verify that the /gamification/state endpoint returns the current gamification state of the user including xp, level, streak, hearts, gems, and achievements.

title: get user achievements
description: Verify that the /gamification/achievements endpoint returns a list of achievements for the user with correct properties including id, name, description, icon, and unlocked status.

title: get supported languages
description: Verify that the /languages endpoint returns a list of supported languages including English, Spanish, French, Italian, Croatian, and Chinese with correct language properties.

title: update user language settings
description: Verify that the /user/language-settings endpoint updates the user's language settings when provided with valid mainLanguage, targetLanguage, showTranslations, and showPhonetics in the request body.

title: convert speech to text
description: Verify that the /speech/recognize endpoint converts uploaded audio speech to text accurately and returns the recognized text along with confidence score.

title: convert text to speech
description: Verify that the /speech/synthesize endpoint converts provided text to speech audio and returns a valid audio file URL for playback.
